name: MIDINotificationMessageID
desc: The types of state changes the system supports.

items.name: case msgSetupChanged
items.desc: Some aspect of the current MIDI setup changed.

items.name: case msgObjectAdded
items.desc: The system added a device, entity, or endpoint.

items.name: case msgObjectRemoved
items.desc: The system removed a device, entity, or endpoint.

items.name: case msgThruConnectionsChanged
items.desc: The system created or disposed of a persistent MIDI Thru connection.

items.name: case msgSerialPortOwnerChanged
items.desc: The system changed a serial port owner.
